IF(WIN32)
	IF(NOT EXISTS "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r18/ndk-build.cmd")

		##DKINSTALL(${DKONLINE}/Tools/android-ndk-r18-windows-x86_64.zip android-ndk-r18)
	ENDIF()
	GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(ANDROID_NDK "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r18" ABSOLUTE)  #Get the windows short filepath
ENDIF()

ENDIF()
